OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD CHURCHES COUNCIL FOR COMMUNITY CARE GOOD NEIGHBOUR SCHEME

Desc.entry: A registered charity which aims to enhance the quality of life for older people aged over 65 years and their family carers through volunteers who offer regular or occasional friendly visiting and other support such as occasional sitting to give the carer time to attend an appointment, holiday checks by telephone or visits for the duration of the carer's holiday. Practical help includes help with shopping in an emergency, rearranging furniture to enable greater mobility and escorting individuals to hospital appointments. Services are provided free of charge and are subject to volunteer availability.
